TABLE.NAME: local_campusconnect_ecs
TABLE.COMMENT: Settings for connecting to different ECS

FIELD.NAME: enabled
FIELD.COMMENT: Is this ECS currently active?

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: The local name used to identify this ECS

FIELD.NAME: url
FIELD.COMMENT: The URL of the ECS

FIELD.NAME: auth
FIELD.COMMENT: The type of authentication to use (1 = none, 2 = http, 3 = certificate)

FIELD.NAME: ecsauth
FIELD.COMMENT: The ecsauth name to add to the header when using no authentication

FIELD.NAME: httpuser
FIELD.COMMENT: The username to use with basic http auth

FIELD.NAME: httppass
FIELD.COMMENT: The password to use with basic http auth

FIELD.NAME: cacertpath
FIELD.COMMENT: The path to the CA certificate when using certificate authentication

FIELD.NAME: certpath
FIELD.COMMENT: The certificate path to use with certificate authentication

FIELD.NAME: keypath
FIELD.COMMENT: The path to the key file for use with certificate authentication.

FIELD.NAME: keypass
FIELD.COMMENT: The key password for use with certificate authentication.

FIELD.NAME: crontime
FIELD.COMMENT: How often to check for updates from this ECS server (in seconds)

FIELD.NAME: lastcron
FIELD.COMMENT: The last time we checked for updates from this ECS server

FIELD.NAME: importcategory
FIELD.COMMENT: The course category id to put imported courses into

FIELD.NAME: importrole
FIELD.COMMENT: The shortname of the role to assign to incoming users

FIELD.NAME: importperiod
FIELD.COMMENT: The number of months to keep imported users active

FIELD.NAME: notifyusers
FIELD.COMMENT: Comma-separated list of email addresses to notify about new users via ECS

FIELD.NAME: notifycontent
FIELD.COMMENT: Comma-separated list of email addresses to notify about new external courses via ECS

FIELD.NAME: notifycourses
FIELD.COMMENT: Comma-separated list of email addresses to notify about newly exported courses via ECS

TABLE.NAME: local_campusconnect_eventin
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores incoming events from the ECS server, until they have been processed

FIELD.NAME: type
FIELD.COMMENT: The resource type the event is linked to

FIELD.NAME: resourceid
FIELD.COMMENT: The ID of the resource on the ECS server

FIELD.NAME: serverid
FIELD.COMMENT: The ECS server this event came from

FIELD.NAME: status
FIELD.COMMENT: The status of the event ('created', 'updated', 'destroyed', 'new_export')

FIELD.NAME: failcount
FIELD.COMMENT: Counts how many times this message has failed to be processed

FIELD.NAME: courseid
FIELD.COMMENT: The ID of the 'fake' course that will redirect to this link

FIELD.NAME: url
FIELD.COMMENT: The external URL to redirect to

FIELD.NAME: resourceid
FIELD.COMMENT: The ID of this course link on the ECS server

FIELD.NAME: ecsid
FIELD.COMMENT: The ID of the ECS server that this link came from

FIELD.NAME: mid
FIELD.COMMENT: The member ID of the site this course came from

TABLE.NAME: local_campusconnect_part
TABLE.COMMENT: Settings for participants in an ECS

FIELD.NAME: ecsid
FIELD.COMMENT: ECS that this participant is found on

FIELD.NAME: mid
FIELD.COMMENT: The ID of the participant in the community on the ECS server

FIELD.NAME: export
FIELD.COMMENT: Should courses be exported to this participant?

FIELD.NAME: import
FIELD.COMMENT: Should course be imported from this participant?

FIELD.NAME: importtype
FIELD.COMMENT: How to treat courses imported from this participant

FIELD.NAME: active
FIELD.COMMENT: When the list was last refreshed, was this participant in the list?

FIELD.NAME: uselegacy
FIELD.COMMENT: 1 if the legacy URL params should be sent when following course links

FIELD.NAME: personuidtype
FIELD.COMMENT: The personuidtype to use when following course links

FIELD.NAME: exportfields
FIELD.COMMENT: Comma-separated list of user fields to include in the export

FIELD.NAME: exportfieldmapping
FIELD.COMMENT: Mapping of ECS fields => Moodle fields (serialised)

FIELD.NAME: importfieldmapping
FIELD.COMMENT: Mapping ecs field => Moodle field (serialised)

FIELD.NAME: orgabbr
FIELD.COMMENT: The abbreviation for this organisation

TABLE.NAME: local_campusconnect_mappings
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores the metadata mappings for each ECS course import/export

FIELD.NAME: field
FIELD.COMMENT: The destination field for the mapping

FIELD.NAME: setto
FIELD.COMMENT: The field / string to set the destination field to

FIELD.NAME: ecsid
FIELD.COMMENT: The ECS this mapping is associated with

FIELD.NAME: type
FIELD.COMMENT: The type of mapping (1 = import_course, 2 = import_external_course, 3 = export_course, 4 = export_external_course)

TABLE.NAME: local_campusconnect_export
TABLE.COMMENT: Details of the courses that are exported via the ECS

FIELD.NAME: courseid
FIELD.COMMENT: The course being exported

FIELD.NAME: ecsid
FIELD.COMMENT: The ECS being exported to

FIELD.NAME: mids
FIELD.COMMENT: Comma-separated list of participant ids that this course is shared with

FIELD.NAME: status
FIELD.COMMENT: What has happened to this export since the ECS was last informed (0 = nothing, 1 = created, 2 = updated, 3 = deleted)

FIELD.NAME: resourceid
FIELD.COMMENT: The ID of the resource on the ECS server

TABLE.NAME: local_campusconnect_dirroot
TABLE.COMMENT: Contains the root nodes of the directory trees passed on from the CMS via the ECS server.

FIELD.NAME: resourceid
FIELD.COMMENT: The ID of the resource on the ECS server

FIELD.NAME: rootid
FIELD.COMMENT: The ID of the root node on the CMS

FIELD.NAME: title
FIELD.COMMENT: The name of the directory node from the CMS

FIELD.NAME: ecsid
FIELD.COMMENT: The ID of the ECS that this resource came from

FIELD.NAME: mid
FIELD.COMMENT: The participant this directory tree came from

FIELD.NAME: categoryid
FIELD.COMMENT: The Moodle category this directory tree is mapped on to (null for none)

FIELD.NAME: mappingmode
FIELD.COMMENT: The mapping mode of this tree (0 - pending, 1 - whole tree, 2 - manual mapping, 3 - deleted)

FIELD.NAME: takeovertitle
FIELD.COMMENT: Should the directory tree take over the category title?

FIELD.NAME: takeoverposition
FIELD.COMMENT: Should directory tree take over the category sort order?

FIELD.NAME: takeoverallocation
FIELD.COMMENT: Should the tree take over directory allocations?

TABLE.NAME: local_campusconnect_dir
TABLE.COMMENT: A directory node from the CMS via the ECS server

FIELD.NAME: resourceid
FIELD.COMMENT: The ID of the resource on the ECS server

FIELD.NAME: rootid
FIELD.COMMENT: The ID of the root of the directory tree

FIELD.NAME: directoryid
FIELD.COMMENT: The ID of the directory on the CMS

FIELD.NAME: title
FIELD.COMMENT: The title of the directory, from the CMS

FIELD.NAME: parentid
FIELD.COMMENT: The directoryid of the parent directory

FIELD.NAME: sortorder
FIELD.COMMENT: Used to define the order in which directories should be displayed

FIELD.NAME: categoryid
FIELD.COMMENT: The Moodle category this directory is mapped onto (null if not mapped)

FIELD.NAME: mapping
FIELD.COMMENT: The mapping mode (0 - automatic, 1 - manual, 2 - deleted)

TABLE.NAME: local_campusconnect_crs
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores information about courses created by campusconnect

FIELD.NAME: courseid
FIELD.COMMENT: The ID of the course that has been created

FIELD.NAME: resourceid
FIELD.COMMENT: The resourceid on the ECS server

FIELD.NAME: cmsid
FIELD.COMMENT: The ID by which the course is known on the CMS

FIELD.NAME: ecsid
FIELD.COMMENT: The ECS server this course came from

FIELD.NAME: mid
FIELD.COMMENT: The participant this course came from

FIELD.NAME: internallink
FIELD.COMMENT: Is this an internal link, or is it the 'real' course?

FIELD.NAME: urlresourceid
FIELD.COMMENT: The resourceid for the course_url resource sent back to the ECS server

FIELD.NAME: urlstatus
FIELD.COMMENT: Does the course_url need updating on the ECS server (0 = up to date; 1 = created; 2 = updated; 3 = deleted)

FIELD.NAME: sortorder
FIELD.COMMENT: The order in which courses should be displayed (if sortorder is specified)

FIELD.NAME: directoryid
FIELD.COMMENT: The CMS directoryid this course is allocated within

TABLE.NAME: local_campusconnect_mbr
TABLE.COMMENT: Stored details of requested membership lists from the ECS

FIELD.NAME: resourceid
FIELD.COMMENT: The resourceid for this membership list on the ECS

FIELD.NAME: cmscourseid
FIELD.COMMENT: The identifier by which the course is known on the CMS

FIELD.NAME: personid
FIELD.COMMENT: The ID by which the user is known on the CMS

FIELD.NAME: personidtype
FIELD.COMMENT: The type of the personid

FIELD.NAME: role
FIELD.COMMENT: The role requested by the CMS

FIELD.NAME: status
FIELD.COMMENT: The current status of the membership list request - role assigned (0), request created (1), updated (2), to be deleted (3)

FIELD.NAME: parallelgroups
FIELD.COMMENT: List of the parallel groups this user should be enrolled into

TABLE.NAME: local_campusconnect_notify
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores a list of notifications to send out to users.

FIELD.NAME: ecsid
FIELD.COMMENT: The ECS that this notification relates to

FIELD.NAME: type
FIELD.COMMENT: The type of notification to send out.

FIELD.NAME: subtype
FIELD.COMMENT: 0 - create, 1 - update, 2 - delete resource

FIELD.NAME: data
FIELD.COMMENT: The ID of the relevant object to send information about

FIELD.NAME: extra
FIELD.COMMENT: An extra string to display beside the notification item

INDEX.NAME: ecsid_type
INDEX.COMMENT: Allows you to quickly get all the notifications of a particular type for an ECS

TABLE.NAME: local_campusconnect_filter
TABLE.COMMENT: Controls the mapping of imported courses onto categories

FIELD.NAME: categoryid
FIELD.COMMENT: The destination category for this mapping

FIELD.NAME: attribute
FIELD.COMMENT: The name of the attribute this mapping uses

FIELD.NAME: words
FIELD.COMMENT: Comma-separated list of words to filter by (blank to accept all words).

FIELD.NAME: createsubdirectories
FIELD.COMMENT: Controls whether or not subdirectories should be created (named after the attribute values)

TABLE.NAME: local_campusconnect_pgroup
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores details of parallel groups for students to enrol in.

FIELD.NAME: ecsid
FIELD.COMMENT: The ECS that this group came from

FIELD.NAME: resourceid
FIELD.COMMENT: The course resource that this group relates to

FIELD.NAME: grouptitle
FIELD.COMMENT: The title of the group (from the CMS)

FIELD.NAME: courseid
FIELD.COMMENT: The course that the group belongs to

FIELD.NAME: groupid
FIELD.COMMENT: The ID of the Moodle group this maps onto

FIELD.NAME: cmscourseid
FIELD.COMMENT: The cms course this group is part of

FIELD.NAME: groupnum
FIELD.COMMENT: The number of this group within the list of groups for the course

TABLE.NAME: local_campusconnect_enrex
TABLE.COMMENT: Queue of enrolment status notifications to export to the ECS

FIELD.NAME: courseid
FIELD.COMMENT: The course that the user has enrolled / unenrolled

FIELD.NAME: status
FIELD.COMMENT: The status message to send to the ECS

FIELD.NAME: notifiedecsids
FIELD.COMMENT: The ECS that have been notified, so we know when we can delete this record
